lu_quan_ke_ji.name: 祿權科忌

key_definitions.lu_hua: 化祿 - Wealth transformation, surplus, giving
key_definitions.quan_hua: 化權 - Power transformation, control, authority
key_definitions.ke_hua: 化科 - Talent transformation, academic achievement, reputation
key_definitions.ji_hua: 化忌 - Taboo transformation, deficiency, loss

key_points: Lu-Quan together suitable for business and financial management
Lu-Ke indicates reputation and wealth combined
Quan-Ke represents easily gained reputation for technical professionals
All four transformations indicate complete destiny pattern

kong_jie_jia_ming.name: 空劫夾命
kong_jie_jia_ming.english: Void and Robbery Stars Sandwich Life Palace
sources: 古傳紫微斗數傳統解釋
key_points: Only occurs when Life Palace is in Si (巳) or Hai (亥) position
If not in same palace but two separate palaces, each star's power is only half as strong
The sandwiched palace is considered a weakened or broken palace
Tiankong and Dijie create four different structures: same palace, sandwich, arch, opposition
Structure creates wave/volatility and setback characteristics

hong_luan_tian_xi.name: 紅鸞天喜
hong_luan_tian_xi.english: Red Phoenix and Heaven Joy Love Pattern
sources: 古傳紫微斗數傳統解釋
key_points: Both stars appear together in Life or Marriage Palace
Indicates strong romantic luck and emotional richness
More favorable when in Life or Marriage Palace
Relates to attraction and relationship harmony

tian_liang_zhao_yuan.name: 天梁朝垣
sources: 古傳紫微斗數傳統解釋
key_points: Tian Liang star with aspect to Career or Body Palace
Indicates nobility (貴氣) and good interpersonal relationships
Facing Court formation especially indicates reputation
Character is valued by others, easy to receive help

san_fang_hui_zhao.name: 三方會照
sources: 古傳紫微斗數傳統解釋
key_points: Main star appears in three key palaces: Life, Wealth, Career (命財官)
Power and influence concentrate in these three directions
Indicates outstanding achievement in related fields
If auspicious star: great fortune; if inauspicious: requires caution

notes.zhongzhou_school: The Zhongzhou School (中州派) is known for its modern, practical approach to Ziwei interpretation, emphasizing that destiny can be changed through proper understanding and action.
notes.four_transformations: Four transformations (四化) are unique to Ziwei Doushu, representing the twelve earthly branches' transformative properties based on the native's birth data.
notes.palace_structures: Star combinations are analyzed through palace structures (格局) which determine their auspiciousness and manifestation patterns.

validation_status: Sourced from publicly available academic and educational materials. Further validation recommended for classical text interpretations.
